column1: ADH is a substance produced naturally by the hypothalamus and released by the pituitary gland.
This hormone controls the amount of water your body loses through the urine.
Certain lung cancers and some head and neck tumors are the most common cancers that cause this problem.
In very rare cases, other tumors can cause ectopic ADH secretion.
Too much water is kept in the blood and dilutes many substances in the blood.
